name: FOR_BLOCK
input: main() { for (i=0; i<3; i=i+1) { return i; } }

name: MULFUNC1
input: main() { return a() + a(); } a() { return 3 * 4; }

name: MULFUNC2

name: ARG0

name: ARG1
